title: Pbe down or is riot not accepting more
body: Is it just e or are pbe down because riot does not want anymore pbe testers or are they down for a awhile?

replies.body: The PBE page is currently down until further notice for upgrades, and it won't be possible to signup or make an account to the PBE right now.  I don't have any details beyond that, but we'll be providing updates on the [PBE Status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  Hang tight!
